error.title: Warning!
error.message: There are no results, matching your search criteria!

settings.title: Settings
settings.note: * Please note, at the moment, this app provides information for licensed taxi services in Sofia, Varna, Bourgas, Pleven and Rousse (Bulgaria). Other cities in Bulgaria will be added soon.

localData.title: Work offline
localData.note: * Downoload our database on your device. The app will be working without using your data plan. Data transfer is estimated at 300 KB and they will use approx 5 MB space while uncompressed.

message.newData: You need to download an update! There is a new version generated {{since}}.
